definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (prob. = (sacred) territory of the Sun.; WMM:As. u. Eur. 165 thinks perh. Eg. Ḥ‘-ra-tà); in hill-country of Ephr., westward, Ju Jdg 2:9 = foll. (cf. GFM) = Qamnaqa 1 Makk 1Ma 9:50 = mod. Tibneh, c. 17 m. W. of N. fr. Jerusalem, v. also Buhl:Geogr. 170.
